alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Logan, southern Johnson, western Perry, southwestern Conway, Scott, Yell and southwestern Pope Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1016 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Holman to Subiaco to near Midland. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Clarksville... Booneville... Waldron... Paris... Danville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Lamar... Dover... Ola... Mansfield... London... Magazine... Oppelo... Knoxville... Subiaco... Perry... Scranton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and western Arkansas.
